Work prioritization, organizational skills, effective communication, and the ability to react quickly are critical to being successful.Key job responsibilitiesYou will have the opportunity to provide our internal workforce with infrastructure related support, resolving tickets related to HW (Motherboard, RAM, CPU, GPU, etc) and networking tickets (Link Down, Optics Replacements, Switch Replacements, etc).In addition to hardware and network repair, interns will learn how to install equipment, create documentation, innovate solutions, and fix complex problems within the data center space.Duties include:· Hardware troubleshoot in servers which are not live with an AWS technician's supervision· Understand the importance to meet SLA’s against assigned trouble tickets· Follow the AWS technician's during network troubleshooting· Replace Media (SSD/HDD) according with AWS Data Tech guidance· Perform regular server hardware repairs (drives, motherboards etc) under the guidance of experienced techs· Interact with third party vendors & contractors who are working on siteA day in the lifehttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NhMAOg79R2MMentorship & Career GrowthOur team is dedicated to supporting new team members in an environment that celebrates knowledge sharing and mentorship. Projects and tasks are assigned in a way that leverages your strengths and helps you further develop your skillset.Inclusive Team CultureHere at AWS, we embrace our differences. We are committed to furthering our culture of inclusion. We have ten employee-led affinity groups, reaching 40,000 employees in over 190 chapters globally. We have innovative benefit offerings, and host annual and ongoing learning experiences, including our Conversations on Race and Ethnicity (CORE) and AmazeCon (gender diversity) conferences.We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:Dubai, ARE• In pursuit of IT Certification or Technical/Bachelors Degree within a relevant technical field such as Information Technology, Computer Hardware Repair or similar• Demonstrated communication skills, both written and verbal• UAE National with family book• Ability to work well with others in a team environment, displaying strong time management skills• Basic knowledge of Linux is an advantage• Basic knowledge of networking is an advantage

job_description: Are you a wordsmith with a passion for crafting compelling and persuasive content? We're seeking an English Copywriter to join our creative team. Your words will shape our brand's voice and message across various platforms and mediums. .Key Responsibilities: .Content Creation:Write clear, concise, and engaging copy for a range of materials, including website content, blog posts, social media posts, email campaigns, and marketing collateral. .Ad Campaigns:Collaborate with the marketing team to develop copy for advertising campaigns, including Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and other digital advertising platforms. Craft headlines and ad copy that drive clicks and conversions. .Brand Voice:Maintain and develop our brand's unique voice and tone, ensuring consistency across all communication channels. .Research:Conduct thorough research to understand target audiences, industry trends, and competitors, and use this knowledge to inform your writing. .Video Scripts: Create engaging and persuasive scripts for video content, including promotional videos, explainer videos, and advertisements. Collaborate with video producers and directors to ensure the script aligns with the visual concept and overall messaging. .Email Marketing: Write compelling email campaigns that capture the recipient's attention and encourage action, whether it's making a purchase, subscribing, or participating in an event. Ensure emails are personalized and tailored to the audience's interests. .SEO Optimization:Optimize content for search engines (SEO) to improve online visibility and rankings. .Collaboration:Work closely with the marketing and design teams to ensure that copy aligns seamlessly with visual elements and overall messaging.

Your portfolio should highlight your versatility and creativity as a copywriter.
